docs.snippet: It was clear Saturday that the party of Nelson Mandela had suffered steep declines in support in nearly all of South Africa’s major urban areas....
docs.lead_paragraph: It was clear Saturday that the party of Nelson Mandela had suffered steep declines in support in nearly all of South Africa’s major urban areas.
docs.abstract: African National Congress suffers steep plunge in support in local elections among major cities and announces loss in Pretoria, South Africa, to Democratic Alliance, which has seen a rise in support from growing black middle class disillusioned with rampant corruption in party that belonged to Nelson Mandela.

headline.main: A.N.C. Loses Pretoria, South Africa’s Capital, as Setbacks Mount
headline.print_headline: A.N.C.’s Losses Mount With Defeat in Capital

docs.snippet: Trumpian drama dominates some of the more competitive Senate races....
docs.lead_paragraph: Trumpian drama dominates some of the more competitive Senate races.
docs.abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column examines ways in which Donald Trump's presidential candidacy has come to dominate several major Senate races.

docs.snippet: Anti-rape activists protested on Saturday as South African President Jacob Zuma delivered his first remarks since local elections gave his African National Congress (ANC) its worst results since 1994....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anti-rape activists protested on Saturday as South African President Jacob Zuma delivered his first remarks since local elections gave his African National Congress (ANC) its worst results since 1994.

headline.main: Silent South African Anti-Rape Protest During Zuma Speech on Vote
headline.print_headline: Silent South African Anti-Rape Protest During Zuma Speech on Vote

docs.snippet: The African National Congress lost its grip on local government in Tshwane, home of the South African capital Pretoria, as results on Saturday gave the opposition Democratic Alliance a second big win in the ANC's worst election since the end of ap...
docs.lead_paragraph: The African National Congress lost its grip on local government in Tshwane, home of the South African capital Pretoria, as results on Saturday gave the opposition Democratic Alliance a second big win in the ANC's worst election since the end of apartheid.

headline.main: South African's ANC Suffers Worst Election Since Taking Power
headline.print_headline: South African's ANC Suffers Worst Election Since Taking Power

docs.snippet: South Africa's ruling party suffered its worst election setback since taking power at the end of apartheid a generation ago, with the African National Congress losing the capital, Pretoria, and its surrounding Tshwane metropolitan area. But it won...
docs.lead_paragraph: South Africa's ruling party suffered its worst election setback since taking power at the end of apartheid a generation ago, with the African National Congress losing the capital, Pretoria, and its surrounding Tshwane metropolitan area. But it won a tight race for the country's biggest city, Johannesburg, election authorities reported Saturday night.

headline.main: South Africa's Ruling Party Suffers Biggest Election Setback
headline.print_headline: South Africa's Ruling Party Suffers Biggest Election Setback

docs.snippet: The scandals are casting a pall over the achievements of the Front for Victory, the political party of the former president, Cristina Fernández de Kirchner....
docs.lead_paragraph: The scandals are casting a pall over the achievements of the Front for Victory, the political party of the former president, Cristina Fernández de Kirchner.
docs.abstract: Corruption scandals surrounding members of former Argentinian Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner's government are casting pall over achievement of Kirchner's political party; Kirchner's business interests are also being investigated for alleged involvement in kickback scheme; scandals have put national focus on corruption in government.

headline.main: Air of Graft Around Ex-Argentine Government Arouses Fury
headline.print_headline: Air of Corruption Around Former Argentine Government Arouses Fury
